title: DPS-BEST OF-for Sep 07, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF-for Sep 07, 2020
description:
It's The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show! FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and the guys discuss whether or not the Houston Rockets have a Russell Westbrook problem, debate whether or not the Miami Dolphins are making a mistake starting Ryan Fitzpatrick over Tua Tagovailoa in week 1, and discuss if Giannis Antetokounmpo’s history of regular season dominance followed by postseason struggles proves that he’s the Peyton Manning of the NBA. Plus, Super Bowl champion and FOX NFL analyst Dave Wannstedt swings by to explain why he thinks defenses will eventually be able to catch up with Lamar Jackson, why he's all-in on the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2020, and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
